readable.title: 3433982387_3fa993cf5a
readable.content: A girl in a white dress is playing with bubbles while a mother and daughter stand to the side . A woman stands with two young girls in dresses looking at bubbles . A young girl in a white dress watches bubbles while a woman and girl toddler observe . Two girls looking at bubbles in the air . Two little girls and an adult watch bubbles float through the air in front of them .
